isis.stitle: DT/DTI-466 A and B Series DT/DTI/DTA-466 C Diesel Engine Diagnostics (1993) - ENGINE DIAGNOSTIC TOOLS - CRANKCASE PRESSURE ORIFICED RESTRICTOR (ZTSE-4039) w/0.406 in. ORIFICE

svcsubsec.title: CRANKCASE PRESSURE ORIFICED RESTRICTOR (ZTSE-4039) w/0.406 in. ORIFICE

svcproc.title: DESCRIPTION
svcproc.para: The restrictor is used to measure combustion gas flow out of the engine breather and is used with the Model 100 or 200 pressure test kit, (ZTSE-2239 or D-200).

important.para: PRESSURE READINGS OBTAINED WITH THIS RESTRICTOR MUST BE USED AS THE MAIN SOURCE OF ENGINE CONDITION. OIL CONSUMPTION TREND DATA MUST ALSO BE USED IF THE PRESSURE READINGS ARE BEYOND THE SPECIFIED LIMITS. NEITHER CHANGES IN OIL CONSUMPTION TRENDS NOR CRANKCASE DIAGNOSTIC PRESSURE TRENDS CAN ESTABLISH A SPECIFIC COMPONENT PROBLEM, BUT ARE ONLY INDICATORS THAT SOME PROBLEM EXISTS.
